ygData.subject: RE: Gob Pets in Oasis?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Ummm, what are you talking about?  Hast apparently DID tell people what he got, since that was reported in the e-mail to which you replied.  And while you
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 5 Aug 1999, Treadway, Donald wrote:

> From: "Treadway, Donald" <DTreadway@...>
>
> In fact it was Brian Hook, formerly of Quake 3 fame who ran that event. The
> thing that disgusts me is that that wizard told everyone that the Archon
> dropped nothing. It took everyone in the zone to deal with the mob's and
> the Archon, and this guy not only has the gall to keep the loot all to
> himself, but also to lie about what he got. Gives all wizards a bad name,
> oh, wait, they already have that, don't they.

Ummm, what are you talking about? Hast apparently DID tell people what
he got, since that was reported in the e-mail to which you replied. And
while you might be magnaminous enough to share, most people actually
keep the stuff they earn.

Though I imagine Hast probably shared the rubicite, since it's not
exactly stuff he can wear. =)


--
We cross our bridges when we come to them and burn them behind us,
with nothing to show for our progress but the memory of the smell
of smoke and the presumption that once our eyes watered.
